verses.name: Zechariah 1:11
verses.text: And they answered the angel of the Lord that stood among the myrtle trees, and said, We have walked to and fro through the earth, and, behold, all the earth sitteth still, and is at rest.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:12
verses.text: Then the angel of the Lord answered and said, O Lord of hosts, how long wilt thou not have mercy on Jerusalem and on the cities of Judah, against which thou hast had indignation these threescore and ten years?

verses.name: Zechariah 1:13
verses.text: And the Lord answered the angel that talked with me with good words and comfortable words.
